Reviews.Title: User friendly, very easy to handle.
Reviews.Author: DJ Come of Age "DJ COA"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent product. I bought my Sony to make video reviews and to take a multitude of pictures. The camera comes with a very user friendly "how to" manual for those of us who aren't too tech savvy. For the price, it is a steal. The picture quality is excellent and rivals the quality from a lot of more expensive cameras. The Sony software isn't interchangeable with other brands so be ready to pay a little more to equip your product with Sony only products. All in all, an excellent purchase!

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Rosaidh Ceallach
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift for my teenager.  The camera is awesome. In my opinion, better than the Canon PowerShot I have.  It has a very nice display, the pictures are clear and crisp.  The shutter movement is quick. I would recommend as a good deal for anyone needing a quality camera for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Good camera ., Excelent Pictures ....
Reviews.Author: Omar G Rios
Reviews.Content: I'm in the Saltwater Fish Bussines, and its very important to have nice pictures of the exotic fish that arrive every time, and this camera does the job , nice, crisp, 8 MP say averything and if you add a 2 or 4 GB memory stick you can take hundred of pictures .....

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Jim McGiveron  http://nosmokejim.blogspot.com...
Reviews.Content: Sony has been around for a long time,and they have a great reputation,allmy stereo components are Sony.This Sony camera is compact,lightweight,and takes great photos.Great zoom,much better than most cameras,the overall performance is awsome!

Reviews.Title: Terrific Camera!
Reviews.Author: Penny Pinching Polly "Check out my website fo...
Reviews.Content: I use my Sony Cybershot primarily for capturing precious moments involving my ninja fast 3 year old.  It is crucial that the camera I am using produce high quality photos that I can have printed in 8 x 10 and 10 x 13 sizes.  My Cybershot has NOT let me down!This camera is lightweight, compact, but packs a very heavy punch.  I have used it to take photos which have been turned into greeting cards, into poster size prints, and used on web sites.  The quality is that good!The Sony Cybershot is very user friendly, has a great zoom feature, and is worth every penny.  This is a TRUE "point & shoot" digital camera.I highly recommend this camera.  There is now a newer model, Sony Cybershot DSC-S980 12MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom with Super Steady Shot Image Stabilization (Black), with 12MP, rather than the 8.1MP.

Reviews.Title: Great point-and-shoot digital camera
Reviews.Author: Emily Gander "La Diva Loca"
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift, and absolutely love its functionality. So far it's proven easy to use and good quality. The screen is large and vivid. The five-point auto focus works well, and gives you great clarity in your pictures. The flash is a bit slow, but otherwise it's a fast shot. The only downside is that you have to use the sony memory card and adapter in order to get pics onto your computer or printed at the store. Otherwise, it's a great buy! I'd recommend it for someone looking for a compact, easy-to-use digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!!!
Reviews.Author: Kendall Cub
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures and does not require a lot of technical knowledge.  Our 3 year old will not sit still for pictures and this camera is so fast, we actually get several great shots! Also, I notice a difference with the 8.1 MP in the clarity of many of our photos. I love all the options available and that it's a camera that a technical idiot like myself can use.

Reviews.Title: nice cam!
Reviews.Author: Mobashar M. Sharif
Reviews.Content: This works pretty well.  It does have great features which I believe every 8.1MP camera have.  Got this as this was a Sony and the combo deal with the SD card and the care.  Picture quality is superb and sharp.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Abderrahim Bennaamara
Reviews.Content: Great working in good conditions , arrives on time I like it that's what I was looking for also takes a nice pectures

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: Alex Argitis
Reviews.Content: this product has filled my expectations for the use we give has the quality I expected, it's great thank you very much

Reviews.Title: camara
Reviews.Author: Norman Barrios
Reviews.Content: muy buen equipo imagenes de muy buena calidad viedeos que cuentan con lo necesario el audio es bastante bueno estoy satisfecho

Reviews.Title: SONY DSCS780 digital camera.
Reviews.Author: Doc Mauer
Reviews.Content: This camera is a replacement for the same model we used that died after a sudden stop on a hard surface.  We liked the camera and chose to get another so our accessories would still be useful.  So far so good.  Primary use is capturing pictures of wedding cakes and it does this nicely.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: payden
Reviews.Content: i love this camera. it did want i needed for it in yellowstone.  only thing is the zoom isnt that great so i couldn't really video tape old faithful.... but besides the zoom its great

Reviews.Title: SONY MEANS QUALITY
Reviews.Author: R. Donovan "Refurbished fool"
Reviews.Content: I've owned a few products by Sony over the years and was always impressed with their makeup and the quality service from them. This was my first camera by them and as usual I was impressed. The look and feel was the first thing that gets your attention and then you check out the OS and see the ease of operation and the clarity and colors of the prints and gives you the feeling that says, "I definitely made the right choice buying this product"

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: F. Mann
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my boyfriend for his bday. He has played with it a little bit and likes it. He thinks I paid quite a bit of money for it, so I would say that it was a great value considering I got it near 50% list price.

Reviews.Title: INCUMPLIMIENTO
Reviews.Author: CARLOS GUILLEN
Reviews.Content: EL PRODUCTO NUNCA FUE ENTREGADO Y POR FALTA DE EXPERIENCIA NUNCA ME LLEGO Y EL CASO QUEDO ASI A PESAR DE QUE ME FUE COBRADO, NO CREO QUE SEA LO MAS JUSTO CON SUS CLIENTES!!!!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot DSCS780
Reviews.Author: Humberto Salazar Lopez
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera, it was more than I spected. I consider that buying this camera is one of my best purchases. The photos have great quality, I really recomend this product.

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: David Veca
Reviews.Content: You have to hold the button down forever and sometimes when you press the button it doesn't work and you have to press it again. Also, the camera ONLY uses sony sd cards, which are more expensive and don't even fit into the digital photo printer at my local cvs, you have to do it through the usb wire sony provides. The usb is also specific to the camera, the end that attaches to the camera is far, far smaller than similar small usb ports that I've had on other cameras that have allowed me to use usb's interchangablyI would not recommend this camera, buy something not made by sony. you'll save money on sd cards, usb cords, and you'll save yourself the trouble of trying to print out the pictures.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money.
Reviews.Author: Amy Miller "Carly Miller"
Reviews.Content: Okay, so I got my new camera, about a week before my best friend's sweet 16.I'm sitting at the table at the sweet 16, looking at some pictures I had taken.The camera slips out of my hand SLIGHTLY and the lens was out.the camera shut off but the lens was still out & it kept saying "turn power on and off"and i kept doing that but NOTHING happened.this camera is WAYYY too delicate.literally, i dropped it about 3 inches from the table.  it's rediculous.it wasn't that great in the first place.the effects weren't great.  the shutter time was VERY SLOW.almost all the pictures without flash came out orangey and blurry.the flash made everything a little TOO bright.find another camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
8.1-megapixel CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 16 x 22-inch prints
3x optical zoom; 2.5-inch LCD display
Face Detection; Smart Zoom feature
High Sensitivity (ISO 1250) mode; 5-point auto focus
22 MB internal memory; capture images to Memory Stick Duo/Pro Duo media
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cybershot DSCS780 8.1MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom
